1.job_description:
Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a

SupportIntern at InternshipStudio located in Pune. We are seeking a motivated Support Intern to join our team and assist in providing outstanding customer support. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a strong customer-centric approach, and a willingness to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:
 Handle incoming customer calls and emails professionally and courteously.
 Provide timely and effective support to customers by troubleshooting issues and resolving inquiries promptly.
 Create and manage support tickets using our internal ticketing system, ensuring accurate documentation of customer interactions and resolutions.

Collaborate with other team members to escalate complex issues and ensure timely resolution.
 Communicate effectively with customers to provide status updates, gather additional information, and ensure a positive support experience.

Qualifications:
 Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in any field or equivalent practical experience.
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information clearly and concisely.
 Customer-focused mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional service.
 Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment.
 Proficiency in using computer applications and familiarity with customer support software is a plus.
 Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and processes.

Experience - Freshers

Location - Baner (Work From Office)

Stipend - 3000 to 5000 per month

Notice Period- Immediate Joiner,

*Internship Opportunity at Lernx*

Lernx, a leading digital learning platform, is offering a 2-month remote internship program for students interested in Sales & Marketing and HR roles.
 About Lernx:*
Lernx provides affordable online courses, industrial training programs, certification programs, one-to-one mentorships, and placement preparations, empowering learners to achieve their goals.
 Eligibility Criteria:*
- Undergraduates, Graduates, and Freshers are eligible to apply
 Internship Details:*
- Duration: 2 months (remote)
- Areas of focus: HR and Sales & Marketing.
 Benefits:*
- Upon completion, interns will receive:
- Various Certificates
- Performance-based Stipend
- Letter of Recommendation
- Potential for Pre-Placement Offer (PPO) based on outstanding performance

This internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience and build a strong foundation in your chosen field.
Apply now to kickstart your career!,

[bold] Job Summary Job Summary As a Frontend React.js Developer, you will be in charge of developing compelling user interfaces and interactive online applications with React.js. You'll collaborate with designers and backend engineers to create responsive designs, integrate APIs, and improve application performance. [bold] Key Responsibilities Key Responsibilities Convert UI/UX designs to high-quality code using React.js and other frontend technologies. Create reusable React components and frameworks to expedite development and ensure consistency across the application. Use Redux, Context API, or other state management tools to effectively manage application state and data flow. Integrate with backend APIs and services to access and manipulate data. Optimize frontend performance by identifying bottlenecks in rendering, network queries, and overall application performance. Write clean, maintainable code that adheres to best practices and coding standards. Conduct unit and integration testing to verify code quality and dependability. [bold] Experience and Qualifications Experience and Qualifications Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. 
 Experienced Frontend Developer specializing on React.js development. 
 Proficient in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other frontend technologies. 
 Extensive knowledge of React.js and its fundamental principles, including virtual DOM, JSX, and component-based architecture. 
 Experience with state management libraries/frameworks, such as Redux or Context API. 
 Experience using frontend build technologies like Webpack, Babel, and npm/yarn. 
 Expertise in responsive design and CSS preprocessors such as Sass or LESS. 
 Experience with RESTful APIs and AJAX. . 
 
 [bold] Job Type: Full-time Job Type: Full-time

Business Development: Identify new business opportunities and proactively market financial products (loans and related services) to potential customers.  Product Promotion: Effectively communicate and promote various financial products offered by the organization to prospective clients.  Sales Targets: Achieve sales targets by effectively managing leads, conversions, and client retention strategies.  Customer Service: Provide excellent customer service to clients, addressing their queries and resolving any issues promptly and professionally.  Market Analysis: Stay updated with market trends, competitor activities, and changes in regulations to identify opportunities and potential risks.  Cross-Selling: Identify cross-selling opportunities and recommend appropriate financial products to clients to meet their needs.  Documentation: Ensure accurate and timely documentation of all client interactions, transactions, and sales related activities.  Compliance: Adhere to the company's policies, procedures, and regulatory guidelines to maintain compliance at all times.  Reporting: Provide regular reports on sales activities, market insights, and customer feedback to the management team.

1.required_skills: Curriculum implementation, Teacher development, Student assessment, Parental involvement, Classroom environment, Administrative responsibilities
1.job_description:
To lead the planning and execution of the Cambridge Early Years curriculum, supporting and guiding pre-primary teachers to create a nurturing, developmentally appropriate learning environment that fosters the physical, emotional, cognitive, and social development of young children.

Key Responsibilities
 Curriculum implementation:

Ensure the effective delivery of the Cambridge Early Years curriculum across all pre-primary classrooms.

Collaborate with teachers to plan and implement lessons that align with the Cambridge Early Years framework, emphasizing holistic child development.

Regularly review and update curriculum materials and teaching resources to ensure they meet Cambridge standards.
 Teacher development and support:

Provide coaching, mentoring, and professional development opportunities for pre-primary teachers to ensure they are well-prepared to deliver the Cambridge curriculum.

Conduct regular classroom observations to provide constructive feedback and support to teachers.
 Student assessment and development:

Guide teachers in assessing young children's progress using developmentally appropriate tools and Cambridge Early Years assessment methods.

Ensure that assessments reflect a child's development in key areas, including communication, physical development, personal-social development, and early literacy and numeracy.
 Parental involvement:

Organize and lead parent-teacher meetings to discuss the progress and development of pre-primary students.

Provide parents with regular updates on their childs development and ways they can support learning at home.

Address any parental concerns related to the pre-primary program and Cambridge curriculum implementation.
 Classroom environment:

Ensure that classrooms are set up in a manner that fosters exploration, creativity, and learning in a safe and nurturing environment.

Assist teachers in creating developmentally appropriate activities and experiences that support all areas of a childs development.

Ensure compliance with health and safety standards in all pre-primary classrooms.
 Administrative responsibilities:

Maintain records of student progress, attendance, and teacher performance.

Develop and oversee the implementation of policies related to early childhood education.

Coordinate with school administration on scheduling, resource allocation, and reporting requirements.

About Company: Our sole aim at MentorBoxx is to bridge the gap between universities & industries. We select 30 students every month to regularly interact with the right industry experts, work on live industry projects, and grasp as much industry knowledge as possible.,

1.job_description:
Job Purpose

To oversee the implementation of the Cambridge International curriculum, ensuring high academic standards, supporting teachers with lesson planning, and maintaining an effective and well-organized learning environment.

Key Responsibilities
 Curriculum management:
 Ensure that the Cambridge curriculum is delivered effectively across all grades.
 Collaborate with teachers to develop lesson plans that align with Cambridge standards and objectives.
 Review and update curriculum materials as required, ensuring they meet Cambridge guidelines.
 Teacher support:
 Assist in the recruitment and onboarding of qualified Cambridge teachers.
 Provide ongoing support, coaching, and training to teaching staff.
 Monitor and evaluate teacher performance, providing feedback for continuous improvement.
 Student assessment:
 Oversee the implementation of Cambridge assessments and examinations.
 Analyze student performance data to identify areas for improvement.
 Collaborate with teachers to create intervention plans for students who need additional support.
 Parental engagement:
 Organize parent-teacher meetings to discuss student progress.
 Act as a liaison between parents and the school administration on academic matters.
 Address parental concerns regarding the Cambridge curriculum and student performance.
 Administrative duties:
 Maintain accurate academic records, including grades, attendance, and student progress reports.
 Coordinate and participate in Cambridge training sessions, workshops, and seminars.
 Assist in the development of school policies related to academics and student conduct.

2.job_description:
The role entitles tracking, annotation, labeling, and generating prompts & contents for datasets for training the machine learning algorithms. The Data Annotation Specialist has the responsibility to create & curate sets of data specifically created for computer vision & future technologies by using a combination of tracking, annotation, labeling, and generating prompts & content on images, videos, or audio. As a member of the Data Annotation team, you will help us Annotate data for use within a larger machine learning & AI/ML framework. You will be part of a great international team of scientists & professionals who bring cutting-edge technology in verticals like Autonomous Driving to the auto industry as well as working for industries like Retail, Medi-tech, Agri-tech, Gen AI, etc. that will all benefit from machine learning & ai in the near future. joining our team means playing an integral role in bettering the world with science & technology.

Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include
 Accurately label and annotate data in all formats before it reaches the end customer.
 Annotate and label 2D/3D bounding boxes for various industries.
 Tag and track while working on sports annotation.
 Collaborate with teammates, label images, and provide feedback to clients" engineers and data scientists to improve tools and algorithms.
 Write content while viewing images and videos to train the next level of ChatGPT.
 Work in a fast-paced environment that requires high accuracy, attention, and detail.

Manage both on-page SEO and off-page SEO Activities content marketing to create high-quality content relevant terms Manage and improve organic search engine performance and goal-setting based on click throughrates, traffic, and conversions stay up-to-date with the latest trends and changes in SEO and major search engine responsibilities and Duties Knowledge of the Internet and the working of Search Engine Knowledgeof HTML and meta tags and descriptions basic knowledge of SEO methods and tools demonstrated the ability tolearn and subsequently execute search engine optimization activities. We will be posting daily articles on our website and optimizing for the best search results. Interlinking posts and articles and social sharing the daily post. Learn all the basic SEO strategies (keyword research, link acquisition, 301 redirects, social media best practices, and full on-site optimization) Develop a basic understanding of Google Analytics, Google Webmaster Tools, etc tools to identify and resolve 404 crawl errors and fix dead links improve metadata across main website pages and blog posts. _______________________________________________________________________ Internship Description: Candidate should be able to work on Search Engine Optimization (SEO). Candidate should be able to take all the responsibilities of SEO. Should have Positive, Creative and Analytical mindset. Candidates have to work On-Page as well as Off-Page Activities. On-Page includes: Title, Description, Image Optimization, Video Optimization, Content Writing etc. Off-Page includes Back Linking, Page loading Speed, Article Submission, Classifieds etc. Who can apply: Any Graduate can apply Fresher with Computer Knowledge Comfortable to work in office at Noida Six months duration Benefits: Working on Live Projects Certificate of Internship Job offer after Internship (Performance Based) No fees is charged for Internship Mentor to Guide and complete the tasks assigned to candidate Seoczar IT Services Pvt. 2.required_skills: online lead generation, event management, lead generation, marketing,
2.job_description:
[bold] ABOUT COMPANY! ABOUT COMPANY! [bold] Hindustan Times (Shine.com) Hindustan Times (Shine.com) is India's Leading Online Job and Recruitment Portal - Search & Apply for Latest Job Vacancies across Top Companies in India.
Shine.com is the most innovative and second largest online job portal in India. Founded in 2008, over the past decade, Shine.com has become a prominent name in the recruitment industry. The popularity of the portal is evident from the fact that it has crossed the 3.4 crore candidate landmark and has more than 3 lakh latest job vacancies from leading companies on the site. Shine.com connects jobseekers and recruiters by accurately matching candidate profiles to the relevant job openings through an advanced 2-way matching technology.
 
While most job portals only focus on getting candidates the next job, Shine focuses on the entire career growth of candidates. To this end, Shine has launched Shine Learning- Indias largest career skills site for working professionals with over 500+ courses & certifications. As the industry shifts towards mobile, Shine.com is leading the transition and is the fastest growing job portal on mobile devices, witnessing a 100% YOY growth in mobile traffic and also offers on-the-go jobs through the Shine Job Search App. Shine works closely to bridge the gap between talent & opportunities and offers end-to-end recruitment solutions. 
 
Shine Job Fair brings candidates and top employers under one roof. While Shine HR Conclave brings top HR leaders to share insights on latest trends, innovations & best practices in the HR industry. Shine also has a large reach through its print product, Shine Jobs the Tuesday Job supplement of Hindustan Times making it the only job portal with an integrated print and online offering. [bold] Internship Opportunity! Internship Opportunity! We're excited to announce an opportunity for 2 [bold] talented interns talented interns to join our team for a 6 [bold] -month internship -month internship program! If you're a [bold] 3rd-year student 3rd-year student with at least [bold] one previous internship experience one previous internship experience , wed love to hear from you! [bold] Duration: Duration: 6 months 
 [bold] Stipend: Stipend: 10,000/month 
 [bold] Requirements: Requirements: 3rd-year student with a minimum of 1 completed internship [bold] Why Join Us Why Join Us Step into a Market Research Internship where youll gain: Real-World Market Analysis: Work on projects that shape our business strategy. Skill-Building: Get hands-on experience in data collection, analysis, and research tools. Mentorship: Collaborate with industry experts and receive valuable guidance. Strategic Exposure: See how your insights drive decisions.

2.job_description:
Company Description

RadixVision Services is dedicated to transforming businesses with innovative service solutions in Bhopal. Our team specializes in delivering customized strategies that drive growth, streamline operations, and enhance customer experiences. With a focus on problem-solving and industry expertise, we help clients stay ahead in a competitive market by optimizing processes, leveraging technology, and implementing strategic initiatives.

Role Description

This is a full-time hybrid role for a Business Development Intern at RadixVision Services. The intern will be responsible for tasks such as lead generation, market research, customer service, and communication. While the role is primarily located in Bhopal, there is flexibility for some remote work.

Qualifications
 Analytical Skills and Market Research
 Communication and Customer Service
 Lead Generation
 Strong problem-solving abilities
 Ability to work independently and in a team
 Experience with CRM software is a plus
 Pursuing or completed a degree in Business, Marketing, or related field,

2.required_skills: Database Management, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript,Nodejs, Nextjs, AWS Services, Typescript, Responsive Design, Code Quality, Best Practices
2.job_description:
At Quinx, we are dedicated to revolutionizing project-based learning by providing a solution that empowers students to explore, collaborate and create meaningful projects aligned with their interests. We are passionate about enabling students to develop skills through hands-on project experiences, fostering teamwork, and addressing challenges within the realm of project-based learning.

Position : Web Developer (Full stack) Intern / Full time

Location : Bengaluru

Duration : 6 Months

Stipend : 6k - 10k per month (based on performance)

Experience : Prior work experience and clean & scalable coding style is a plus

Skills & Requirements:

1. Node.js and Next.js (Back-End):

Proficiency in Node.js for server-side logic and API development.

Extensive knowledge of Next.js for server-rendered React applications, including routing, data fetching, and static site generation.

2. AWS Services:

Proficiency in AWS services relevant to DevOps, including but not limited to EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFront, and IAM for infrastructure management.

3. Database Management:

Knowledge of database systems, especially with NoSQL databases like DynamoDB or MongoDB.

4. HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), Typescript and Responsive Design:

Strong foundation in HTML5 and CSS3, responsive design principles, and CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.

Mastery in modern JavaScript features (ES6+) and its application in both front-end and back-end development.

5.Code Quality & Best Practices:

Adherence to clean code practices, code reviews, writing maintainable and scalable code, and implementing best practices for performance optimization. Should be able to Document the code properly and be familiar with Jira.

Responsibilities:

As a backend web developer these are the primary tasks which you will be working on in phases.

Back-End Development:

Design, develop, and maintain server-side logic using Node.js, handling requests and building APIs to support front-end functionalities.

Utilize Next.js for server-rendered React applications, implementing routing, data fetching, and server-side rendering for optimized user experiences.

Collaborate with the Machine Learning team to integrate the ML & DL models with the app.

Database Management: Architect and manage databases, integrating them into the back-end using appropriate libraries and ensuring smooth data operations.

Code Quality and Best Practices: Uphold coding standards and best practices, conduct code reviews, and contribute to creating scalable, maintainable, and efficient codebase. Should also maintain proper code documentation.

Monitoring and Optimization: Deploy and manage infrastructure. Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues and optimize application performance across the stack. Implement caching strategies, performance profiling, and scaling techniques for optimal performance.

Apart from the common perks of stipend, certificate and PPO chances, this opportunity opens you a door to contribute meaningfully under a startup environment to shape the future of project-based learning.

Job Types: Fresher, Internship
Contract length: 6 months

Location Type:
 In-person

Ability to commute/relocate:
 Bengaluru, Karnataka: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)

Application Question(s):
 Declaration: I have read the Job description and would like to apply for 6 months onsite intern at Quinx (Bengaluru) with the provided stipend range of 6k-10k pm.

Education:
 Bachelor's (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Speak with the employer
+91 7338033341,

2.required_skills: Onboarding,Recruitment Support, Employee Records Management
2.job_description:
Job Title: HR Intern

Job Description:

We are looking for a proactive and enthusiastic HR Intern to join our Human Resources team. As an HR Intern, you will support the HR department in various tasks, gaining hands-on experience in a wide range of HR functions. This internship is a great opportunity for someone looking to start their career in Human Resources and develop a strong foundation in HR practices.

Key Responsibilities:
 Recruitment Support: Assist in the recruitment process by posting job openings, screening resumes, conducting initial candidate outreach, and scheduling interviews. Help in maintaining the recruitment database and tracking applicant status.
 Onboarding: Assist in the onboarding process for new hires, including preparing onboarding materials, coordinating orientation sessions, and ensuring all necessary documentation is completed.
 Employee Records Management: Help in maintaining and organizing employee records, ensuring that all files are up-to-date and compliant with company policies and legal requirements.

Job Type: Internship

Work Location: In person,

2.required_skills: Data Collection, Data Management, Data Analysis, Database Maintenance, Reporting, Documentation, Written Communication,Outreach Strategies, Tool Utilization
2.job_description:
ViralChilly, a unit of Digiastic LLP, is recognized as one of the best startups to work for in Jaipur. We are a digital marketing agency with a people-centric approach, working with reputed clients like Canva, Adobe, Stillio, and more.We are seeking a motivated and enthusiastic Outreach Intern to assist with our outreach and engagement efforts. The ideal candidate should be eager to learn about outreach strategies and stakeholder engagement.

Key Responsibilities:
 Data Collection & Management: Assist in collecting and maintaining outreach-related data from various sources.
 Data Analysis: Analyse outreach data to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
 Database Maintenance: Help ensure data accuracy and integrity within our databases.
 Reporting: Prepare regular reports on outreach activities and outcomes.
 Support Outreach Strategies: Collaborate with the team to provide data insights that inform and refine outreach strategies and tactics.
 Documentation: Document data collection processes and methodologies to ensure consistency and reliability in future data handling.
 Tool Utilization: Use data analysis tools and software (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets, data visualization tools) to manage and interpret data effectively.

Qualifications:
 Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a bachelor's degree
 Strong written communication skills.

Things You Should Know
 Work hours: 9 AM to 6:30 PM, Monday to Friday.
 30-minute lunch break + 15-minute tea break.
 Work from office.
 Stipend based on performance and interview.

Job Type: Fresher

Schedule:
 Day shift
 Monday to Friday

Education:
 Higher Secondary(12th Pass) (Preferred)

Experience:
 total work: 1 year (Preferred)
 Customer service: 1 year (Preferred)

Language:
 Hindi (Preferred)
 English (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Speak with the employer

2.required_skills: social media, graphic design, video editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, communication,web management, video shooting, organizational skills, creative mindset, attention to detail
2.job_description:
Job Title: Creative Marketing and Multimedia Intern

Location: Hastaakshar Design Studio, Mayapuri Phase 1

Stipend: 12K to 15K INR per month

Start Date: ASAP

About Us:

Primary Strokes and Jomacs are vibrant businesses led by Daksh Kalra, spanning digital art, music production, and educational content. Youll work in our 2000 sqft design studio, an environment crafted to stimulate creativity and innovation.

Who Youll Work With:

Directly under the mentorship of Ar. Daksh Kalra, this role is ideal for creative individuals looking to engage deeply with entrepreneurial and artistic projects.

Key Responsibilities:

 Content Management: Manage and schedule content across platforms like Instagram and YouTube.

 Web and Email Management: Update our Wix site and manage email campaigns.

 Graphic and Video Production: Create visual content and edit videos, including video shooting and editing skills, preferably with Adobe Premiere Pro.

 Lead Management: Handle inquiries and coordinate lead follow-ups.

 Networking and Promotion: Participate in pitches and represent our brands in various settings.

What You Will Gain:

 In-depth learning and experimentation across multiple disciplines.

 Direct mentorship from an experienced entrepreneur and artist.

 The opportunity to impact diverse projects combining art, music, and education.

Skills and Qualifications:

 Proficiency in social media, graphic design, and web management tools.

 Strong video shooting and editing skills, particularly in Adobe Premiere Pro.

 Excellent communication and organizational skills.

 A creative mindset with attention to detail.

Education:

 Open to current students or recent graduates in Marketing, Graphic Design, Media Studies, or related fields.

How to Apply:

Please send your resume, a cover letter, and any relevant work samples/portfolio to ar.dakshkalra@gmail.com . Ensure your application highlights your skills and experiences that align with the responsibilities of this role.,
